website_summaries.verdict: Made from high-grade, rust-resistant stainless steel, this long knife bar holds heavy cutlery without slipping.
pros: Unlike other bars we tested that comprised only two thin magnetic strips, this bar boasts a strong magnet all the way through
Heavy knives and tools hang securely without tipping
The stainless steel resists rust caused by damp knives
cons: As the back is not magnetic, the bar can't be affixed to a fridge without adhesives
About double the price of other models, but owners feel the quality justifies the cost

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Solid. I️ recommend it and I️ hate most things.
customer_reviews.author: steve jones

customer_reviews.title: As some other reviewers have suggested mount a 1" wood ...
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have suggested mount a 1" wood block to the knife bar before mounting it to the wall to make the grabbing and placing of knives easier. The 3/4" thickness of the bar is not enough clearance to keep your knuckles from scrapping the wall.
customer_reviews.author: TWU

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Me
customer_reviews.text: I own a complete set of Wusthof knives that are stored in a block. I recently purchased a new set of cool looking knives and this magnetic bar allows me to show them off. I don't usually don't try to install things because I tend to mess them up. I was able to mount this product with no problem. I am very happy with the way it looks and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Big-beautiful knife bar!
customer_reviews.text: This 17" magnetic knife bar is just what I needed to hold knives on the side of my fridge. It was more expensive than another one I saw, but it is also 3" longer, so for me it was worth it. I don't anticipate needing another one, but I would recommend it to friends or family that needed one. Also, shortly after I received it Christa from the seller contacted me to check that it had been delivered in good shape. This is quite heavy, and apparently some of the shipping packaging has not been up to the task, but that was not my experience--all good here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Magnetic Knife Holding Strip!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely exactly what it’s described to be and more! Easy to put up and install... Holds my knives for my kitchen perfectly with ease! It’s durable and easy to clean ... Most of my knives as you can see are heavy an they have no problem sticking to the magnetic strip... they don’t slide or anything like other brands where the magnet isn’t strong enough! I absolutely love this product as you can see I bought 3 and will most definitely be buying more as you can’t ever have to many knives lol.... I can not say enough about this product! You will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I lived without this
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen and I've always struggled with my knives. They are dulled in the drawer but take up so much space in blocks... And now they are all organized on the front of my refrigerator. It's genius! They stay sharp and are easy to grap when I need one. The magnet is very strong. One warning - it may leave marks on your refrigerator or other metal surface, if you try to move it around. Put it where you want it and leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Joy

customer_reviews.title: All stainless, strong magnets. Very good knife holder.
customer_reviews.text: I needed in all stainless knife block for my restaurant, after reading many different reviews for nine bucks on Amazon, I chose this one because it had a lot of reviews and said it was a very strong magnet. It is quite strong, and will hold the weight of several ten inch chefs knives very safely and securely. Mounting it to the wall was no problem at all. This is a knife block that I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Frees up space
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I stuck it to the side of my fridge next to the bakers rack I also purchased on Amazon. It is insanely strong and the bar doesn’t slide around at all. It was easy to stick onto the fridge, used the leveler on my phone to measure a straight line and then it just stuck on perfectly. The knives don’t budge and it frees up space on my counters!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife bar. Loved the look of it & how it de-cluttered my counter tops. That being said it continues to fall off the granite backsplash it is attached to. I read the reviews & used double sided gorilla tape. It stays up for a while then comes crashing down which is super scary with small kids in our home. I don’t want to risk screwing or drilling the granite. My next step is to have husband epoxy it to the wall. It’s a great product just need to figure out a solution to keep it up without damage to the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth more to me than the cost
customer_reviews.text: What took me a lifetime to finally get this product? I'm a female cancer survivor in my 80's. Bought two refrigerator 17" magnets. If I knew how to take pictures for this review, I would. Have 10 large knives on one and 17 knives on the other. Put the first bar high on side of refrigerator at the top. The other is 13" below. Super easy to open box on counter next to refrigerator, remove plastic and slap up on side of refrig. I stand and smile at it daily. What a great product. Thank you. Tip: All knives pushed up to base of knife. To remove I grasp handle and lift outward. Releases easily and holds tightly.
customer_reviews.author: B. King

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnet.  Easy install.  Very stable.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel comfortable using adhesives, so I went ahead and drilled holes in my tiles and installed tile anchors (not the ones included with the product, but ones specifically made for tile) The included template made it easy to mark the holes in the correct location. It's always scary drilling through tile, but just go slow, be patient, and keep your drill bit cool. Once the anchors were in place, the magnet installed very easily. It's very sturdy, so I have zero worries about it falling down. It's now a permanent part of our backsplash. The knives look great above our range. I'm really glad I purchased and installed this.
customer_reviews.author: SkootTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me a really nice set of knives for my birthday since I love to cook and I'm always saying I need new knives. The knives he bought me did not come with a knife block or sheaths so I needed to figure out how I was going to store them in between uses. I got the one that mounts to the refrigerator and I love it. My refrigerator is right next to my stove so I have easy access to my knives. The magnet is very strong and I have no fear of them falling off, they feel very safe on it. If I get more knives in the future I will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Monroe

customer_reviews.title: HMmagnets Has the Best Magnetic Knife Holder I have Ever Found...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best magnetic knife holder I have ever had! I have been looking for years and have finally found a keeper...Thanks, HMmagnets! I have had the Magnetic Knife Holder for about six months now. I liked it so much I purchased another one and got rid of my knife blocks to make extra counter space. I highly recommend this product and if you are in the market for one, just buy it. You can't go wrong here. Besides, it even comes with a template that tells you how to put it on the wall and where to put the screws in. Who does that? Most times, products do not have any directions.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Magnet works like a magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully they update the design and or come with better dry wall anchors, if you aren’t going straight into studs go ahead and buy better anchors the ones provided are garbage. Other then that for the price it does the job just as good as one of the more decorative wooden ones. Would give better rating if items provided for install would have been better as well as customer care. Prior to writing review I reached out and basically got told ohh well on install items.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick N.

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, super strong magnet. The rack holds extremely well on my fridge. It goes nowhere, in fact we may have to take the fridge with us when we move....(just kidding). The knives stay put, no worries about them sliding or falling off. I love the extra counter space we now have without the knife block. I had never thought about using one of these....I'm really happy that I finally did. The price may seem a little much, but for the quality and safe place it provides for my knives, I think it is well worth it. Also, it's something you should never have to buy again. It would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not secure and back magnets slip easily-- very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The front (knife side) magnets seemed strong, but the back magnet did NOT adhere to our refrigerator securely. It was a balancing act trying to place knives on the front magnet. Any upset in the balance of the left and right ends of the holder resulted in a massive teeter-totter slide on the refrigerator. A dangerous disaster waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Fail
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the magnet was advertised as double-sided and that I could put it up on the side of my refrigerator without screws or adhesive. It was a complete fail. The magnet immediately started slipping. It couldn't hold even one of my heavy knives without slipping down the side. I previously had a magnetic shelf on the fridge that stuck like glue and wouldn't budge, so it is not my fridge. It is the magnet. This product was not cheap and failed to deliver on its basic promise from the moment I took it out of the box. Very disappointed. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kohler

customer_reviews.title: A perfect knife storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred storing knives on a magnetic strip as opposed to either a knife block or any of the drawer storage solutions. With this products double-sided magnetic design, an unused side of my fridge quickly became an ideal way to store knives for easy access! A possible caveat - the magnets are strong enough to interfere with some implanted medical devices (i.e. pacemakers) at short distances (~ 3 feet.) Not recommended for households for folks with such devices.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: As good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we had limited counter space so we decided to “build up”. The magnet itself has good pull and hold just make sure to dry everything before you plan on putting a knife on it. I’d mount with the screws they include. I wouldn’t use the gorilla tape that others are suggesting. We tried and it didn’t quite work as we would wanted (started to droop on one side then when we went to remove it the tape on one side removed a chunk of paint and the drywall.) so we decided just to drill into the drywall and then mount the screws
customer_reviews.author: Æ R M

customer_reviews.title: Love this.....use it in my RV galley
customer_reviews.text: 'Wanted something for easy access to cooking knives; wife didn't want any mounting screws in the new RV. This was the solution. Read that others had successfully used double sided Gorilla tape to mount this and had some concerns as a solution in the RV (road vibrations, et al.). It has performed excellently (adheres to a thick laminate wall in the galley during all travels, ...so far). I'll include pics at a later date. This is a very strong magnetic bar and is heavy .... substantially so. I do travel with the knives stored in a travel roll and then use them on the bar while at a camping site. This one is the real deal; I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John W Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have had magnetic knife holders in the past, but I've always had a good wall space to put them up. In my new home, there is not good wall that's convenient to the cooking area to put one up. I HATE knife blocks, and found this gem. Since it has a double sided magnet, I just slapped it up on the side of my refrigerator and VIOLA! Instant magnetic knife rack! The magnetic bond on the back is strong enough that it doesn't pull away from the fridge when I take a knife off to use. And, it's a great length, so it holds all of my knives (and some scissors, too!!)
customer_reviews.author: Tg Glazer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: So important to understand that most of the products in this line are for screw at the wall. This one can be use both ways, screwing it at the wall or like me, just put it on the side of the fridge and it’s so convenient. One of my favorite purchases this season.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Product and customer service out of this world!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best magnetic knife blocks on the market. The customer service is amazing and Christa takes the time to follow up with each person who orders. Tbh Amazon is hard to do business with and HMmagnets fights through to make customer service stay alive. The magnets are super strong and the construction and materials used for this product are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ** Used Gorilla Tape - Works Amazing! **
customer_reviews.text: This knife strip is great -- it is sturdy, holds up a lot of knives (even our heavy handmade butcher's knife). We did not want to drill into our kitchen tile, so used gorilla tape, per other reviewer's advice. It fell down once because my husband did not use enough tape. When we put more on (four small strips spaced more evenly apart) it became very sturdy. We also got a message from the seller making sure the mail carrier didn't mangle up the product. Which they did not! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: HJB

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetic & functional
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my choice to buy this knife holder. The aesthetic fits into my LA style apt perfectly. I have a beautiful wood handled knife set and the stainless steel holder looks great !! I have 7 big knifes and it holds them all. I have limited counter space so I decided to replace my block holder in the attempt to open up counter space and this holder did the trick ! Looks great, sturdy and functional. I am very happy I took a chance. They have great customer service and definitely want you to be satifieed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JDUB

customer_reviews.title: It sticks
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a single-sided magnet for our knives and some knives would fall off. This double-sided magnet strip holds tightly to our refrigerator and not a single knife has slipped off. Our knives are never dull because of being rubbed out in a knife block...this is a great solution for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our magnetic fridge knife bar. Excellent quality, love the looks of it as well as the function. Super easy to mount, just stick it to fridge and you're finished. Have been disappointed with a couple of other companies lately so it's a pleasure to do business with one that specializes in a good product and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: freed up counter space
customer_reviews.text: I needed to free up some counter space. Found this magnetic knife holder and my problem was solved. Small kitchen space and a new fridge. Magnet to the side of the fridge and VOILA! Adds a little pizzazz to the fridge too. Love this little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Brent C. Racca

customer_reviews.title: It’s also very beautiful! I’m so happy to have found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knife holder ever! I’m not very good at measuring so this is perfect. Take it out of the box and it practically jumps onto your refrigerator. It is superstrong and you can load it with anything that will cling to a magnet. It stays in place without any movement. It’s also very beautiful! I’m so happy to have found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Charley loffredo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy for anyone's kitchen knives
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw a similar one watching a cooking show on TV. Figured if a TV chef was using it that it would work great for me. And I was right! Holds all my knives, giving me easy access to my cutlery without losing a digit. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stacey c coleman

customer_reviews.title: almost great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The magnet holds knives much better than a different magnetic knife bar I've used. One small issue is that the side of my refrigerator isn't perfectly flat and the bar kind of rotates if I'm not careful. I put double-sided carpet tape, which is very thin and I already have, between the bar and the refrigerator. That worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: High quality knife strip & excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After researching knife storage options, we ordered this double sided magnetic knife strip for ourselves & another as a gift for our daughter. They are heavy duty and ours attached securely to the side of our refrigerator. Before ordering, I was concerned that the strip might slide down once the knives were attached, or might not hold all our knives safely, but it adheres & holds the whole set beautifully. As an added bonus, the seller sent a follow up email to be sure I was happy with my purchases. I would not hesitate to recommend this useful kitchen storage item as well as this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Maison d' Etre

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a space saver for small kitchen in summer cottage. Love that it attaches firmly to refrigerator side rather than using wall. Very powerful hold. Does not move. We have 7 large knives on bar without any problems. Thinking of purchasing another bar to be utilized for craft room tools too. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B Woods

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned one of these knife holders, but this one is great. I saw several videos of other brands sliding down once the knives were attached which worried me. I have a full set of heavy knives attached and this has not happened so far. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's strong enough
customer_reviews.text: The main thing the buyer wants is assurance of the strength of the magnet. Yes, this product is magnetic enough to safely hold on to the side of your refrigerator and safely hold on to the heaviest cutlery (like meat cleavers). It's a stainless steel body and thus easy to clean. The length, 18", is sufficient for a lot of knives. Nothing else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Novak

customer_reviews.title: I'm Actually Quite Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnetic holder to get some of my smaller knives out of my knife drawer and off of my counter top and so far I have been pleasantly surprised. I didn't think it would hold my bigger and heavier knives but guess what? It seems to be working very well. My cleaver alone weighs 880 grams (1.936 lbs), and this magnet is not having any problems at this point. I don't think it will hold it on the very ends of the magnetic strip (without tilting) and of course I'm always careful taking my knives on and off (but I would be anyway), but I think this thing works as advertised and actually better than my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: theducatiguy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love this knife holder. We have a small but functional kitchen. We love to cook so keeping every spare inch of counter space matters. We purchased the double sided magnetic knife holder to place on our fridge. We have it loaded down and it works great!!!! I would recommend to anyone. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nyoka

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get rid of the knife holder taking up space on my counter. This attaches so easily to the fridge. Heavy duty. Attaches firmly - doesn't move around when using it but you can shift positions easily if you need to. I got a smaller one for my magnetic measuring spoons also. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Strong and secure
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best sight-unseen products I've ever purchased. The magnetic attaching to the fridge is incredibly strong and secure, pulling the strip to the fridge from quite a distance. This is now nearly immovable. A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: arm chair philosopher

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! Super strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely glad I splurged for this knife rack and not a cheaper one! Super strong magnet holds all my knives easily. I’m a woman who isn’t super familiar with a power drill and I managed to hang it! The directions aren’t great. But a quick google search on using plastic wall anchors helped. I recommend using the provided guide to mark the wall. Then use a drill to pre-drill holes a little smaller than the anchors. Use a hammer to hammer the anchors into the wall. Then use a screwdriver to insert the screws into the anchor. The directions don’t give those details but it worked well for me to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed and scratches!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and it was all scuffed and scratched! Not too happy at all! I was so excited when this had 5 stars! I’m sure it will work great if I install it but just upset it didn’t come new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Magnet and Attractive as Well
customer_reviews.text: This knife holder is by far the Best. We have had several others in the past before we found this Premium model. We love the new easy mounting and the capacity to hold our big knives in place. Well worth the money, no exceptions. If you want a top quality wall mount knife holder, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, very strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase for a rental, where you don't want to be drilling holes in the walls. It snaps to the refrigerator side easily. My refrigerator door is not of a material that a magnet attracts, so it's on the side. The instructions say to use a side anyway to avoid it being subjected to the door opening and closing. It easily holds all my knives, including a meat cleaver.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I recently downsized from a house to an apartment and it's been a challenge to fit everything efficiently into my new kitchen. This knife holder was a great find because I could attach it to my refrigerator magnetically and free up counter space and still have my knives close at hand. It looks good and the magnet is strong enough that it does not slide around on the side of the refrigerator. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C.Cogen

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: We've always had wall mounted magnets for our knives, but when we unexpectedly had to move into a rental, there was no where in this tiny house to mount one, other than the fridge. VERY HAPPY with this purchase, sooooo easy, grips great, I'm no longer worried about my knives in a drawer!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this knife holder.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and very nice knife holder. As my first try at a magnetic knife holder, I was a bit worried. But this holder eliminated any concerns I had. The magnet is extremely strong. Even my largest butcher knives do not budge on this. Very safe and looks really nice. The power of the magnets is evident in the weight of this thing. Like I said, it is solid. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My wife was skeptical about it but it works like a charm. Stuck it to the fridge and it securely holds every knife in the old wooden block (which we've thrown away to save counter space in our small kitchen). The only thing that's too heavy to stay SECURELY attached is the knife sharpener. It will stick to the magnet, but it fell a couple of times. With kids at home, I don't need anything falling on their little heads. But the knives stay put and are high up and out of reach on the side of the fridge. I would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Cyborg Superman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to clear off some counter space by eliminating a bulky butcher block. It's heavy duty, the magnet is strong enough for even my heaviest knives to be secure, and it looks sleek. The template for the mounting holes was an added bonus. It took me about 5 minutes to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: JBHawk

customer_reviews.title: love my magnetic knife holder
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I purchased this. It is much better than having my knives banging around in my drawer and it frees up drawer space. The magnet is very strong! I have several knives and kitchen scissors attached to this magnet!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kwock

customer_reviews.title: an immediately replacement was sent and much better. These hold as many heavy knives as you ...
customer_reviews.text: First bar was scratched and unappealing, an immediately replacement was sent and much better. These hold as many heavy knives as you want to put on them and are very attractive. With proper mounting, there is no way for the knife holder to fall off or let knives fall. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monty M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This double magnet (magnetic on both sides) was exactly what I needed. Renting and did not want to install into a wall and I have one side of a refrigerator near the stove and this knife rack is working perfectly adhered to it. Seems very sturdy. You can also adhere it to a wall (it comes with the hardware).
customer_reviews.author: Rena Rully

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for all of my knives
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the magnet being strong enough to securely hold all of my knives over the stove. This knife holder did not disappoint. I even hang up a few forged knives that require oiling, and they don't slip off. The bar is easy to clean and looks great. My knives keep a better edge too, since they're not banging around in a drawer. I love it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This knife holder works wonderfully. I was using one from another company and the knives would slip off when put in certain spots on the bar. Very anoying so I was leary about purchasing a new one. I am glad that I did. It only took a minute to install on a ceramic back splash and it hold my knives firmly with no weak spots. This one is the second one I have bought from this company.
customer_reviews.author: romthom

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet - Very Clean & Modern
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Looks great. Hard to find a bar like this that attaches to the fridge. It slides a little, but magnet is very strong. It seems like a really safe hygienic way to store knives.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. This got my knives out of the drawer which I constantly fumble around in. No more sliced fingers I hope.
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I have been looking for a magnetic knife bar to mount on refrigerator, as I did not want to drill holes in back splash(but can be mounted on wall, template for drilling holes is included) this fits the bill perfectly. Very strong, holds all my knives perfectly. I only gave 4 stars because when I ordered the first one Amazon only sent me empty box, this is not the fault of the company who makes the knife holder
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great size with strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great size with strong magnet. As a renter I couldn't use hardware or drill the kitchen tile so I ordered double-sided tape: XFasten Extreme Double-Sided Acrylic Mounting Tape Removable  I was worried it wouldn't hold because the holder is heavy but after several weeks there are no problems. I have 4 large knives and 2 small ones with plenty of space in between. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. And it makes everyone think we are super cool for having all of our big knives stuck up there. My husband and son both cook a lot and love the ease of grabbing a knife off of the bar. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: strong magnets secure
customer_reviews.text: love it! it's huge. I can fit all of my knives on this thing! it fits perfectly on the wall between my stove and microwave! fast shipping. only 2 screws needed (included) to hang it. and it comes with a template so there's no real need to measure. it took on a minute to put up and I was able to toss the old knife block in the trash forever!! love it love it love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Prevatt

customer_reviews.title: So happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this magnetic knife holder because we just remodeled our kitchen. We wanted to get the knife block off the counter but didn't want the knives in a drawer. This knife holder was easy to install, has a powerful magnet to hold several of our knives, and looks great. The stainless finish goes perfectly with our stainless steel appliances. What's best is that it keeps our knives out of the way but still within easy reach. I'd buy it again and would recommend it anytime.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaS

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 Days...
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for 4 days. For some reason it won't even hold up its own weight now. Placed on a clean surface magnetized to the side of the fridge. Worked like a dream, until we came home to our modest selection of 5 knives slid down the side of the fridge. Would be glad to change this review if the company sees this - would love a solution rather than returning.
customer_reviews.author: William Hollifield

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Living in a rental demands space saving wherever possible. I love my knife bar that replaced a bulky wooden thing that took up precious counter space. I just clamped it on to the side of my refrigerator!!! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: amy wolf

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 17” and it fits my ‘specialty’ knives (6) plus kitchen shears (spaced nicely for knife removal and replacement) - exactly what I was looking for. Magnet is strong, stainless looks classy, and it was easy to hang. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Baire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal, I bought one for my restaurant. The kitchen is completely covered in stainless and I didnt want to drill into the stainless to put up a knife rack, found this product and decided to take a chance. I am all about saving money where I can and time where I can't. This product literally took 20 seconds from unboxing until it was up on the wall ready for use and it works great! Phenomenal product that works great! I will be ordering one more for my home as I am now jealous of my restaurant having one and I don't.
customer_reviews.author: david jones

customer_reviews.title: It really works very well and can hold more than knives.
customer_reviews.text: I happen to have a metal plate on the wall behind my stove. Instead of attaching a magnet with screws, I found this double-sided magnet and it works beautifully. Great product. Will be emailing photos separately.
customer_reviews.author: H. Roeder

customer_reviews.title: very strong
customer_reviews.text: I have very little counter space and I bought this so I could free up my counter space. I adheres to my fridge very well. I have had no sliding issues at all and I was able to put up 2 different butcher block knife sets on it. It was longer than I thought it would be. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, and exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I took other reviewers' advice and used the gorilla tape to mount so I didn't have to drill into my new backsplash tile. It was super-easy to mount that way, and after several weeks of using it (fully loaded), I have no reason to believe it won't hold more or less forever. It meets expectations in every way, and I'm thrilled with the fact that it was so much cheaper than comparable products I'd looked at.
customer_reviews.author: annabean

customer_reviews.title: Best ones yet
customer_reviews.text: I own two others purchased a few years ago from another company, but this one was the easiest. I bought it because of the multiple internal magnets that eliminates the knives shifting on the bar. I may go back and get two more to replace the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Laughter1

customer_reviews.title: Love the refrigerator knife magnet holder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my refrigerator after I put tile backsplash in the kitchen and didn’t want to put the knives on the counter or backsplash. It works perfectly. Love the extremely strong magnet knowing it’s not going to slide or fall. I would highly recommend this proxy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Foley

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: if you're worried about the magnet being strong enough - no need. it's amazing. both sides are fantastically strong. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: erindvr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Holds knives securely. Easy to install. I put a small spacer behind it to set it off the wall another inch. Looks great and works as required. Also, they send an email when you receive your order, to make sure it was delivered properly.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: It's very solid, strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the strength of the magnetic pull, my mom was placing it against the fridge and the pull was so strong it actually pinched her finger between it and the fridge, I think it says something about watching out when your getting close to metal but we didn't get to that yet. It does exactly what I wanted, holds knives as solid as it attaches. It adds to the kitchen organization. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carl T.

customer_reviews.title: Spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: Really glad we got rid of the large knife block. This gives us some great countertop space. Glad we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Elsie May

customer_reviews.title: The knife holder of knife holders!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, beautiful, and roomy knife holder--fully 17 inches long and sleek stainless steel. We were able to make a lot of room in an overcrowded drawer and increase our own safety by putting all our sharpest knifes on the wall! The magnet is powerful and the effect is sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator mount -AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a magnetic knife bar but almost all of them are installed via screwing or drilling into the surface which I could not do. This is great!!! So easy to install and sturdy. I've had it for a couple months now and it is works perfect. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I had a minor issue with one of the units received, but support was incredible and unexpectedly helpful solving the matter. I love how it looks. Magnets are strong. Be really careful when you place it on the fridge, and make sure that your fingers are not over the edge, or your will get your fingers pinched as I did lol. It really sticks to the fridge very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: STURDY STURDY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I have a history with knife blocks, but recently moved and there was no counter space. Fortunately my VIKING stove was surrounded with metal siding and I was able to re position my knives on the wall. This was the ONLY knife holder I found that had DOUBLE sided magnetic strip which was important for the new location. I am extremely happy with the purchase and might even get another,as I found they also hold other light weight metal items...hooks to hold additional items such as pan screen, pot holders, lids, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy repackaged items!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was supposed to be wall mounted or placed directly on the fridge. Unfortunately I won’t have the option to mount it on the wall. The bag that the screws were supposed to be in was empty. This is the second repackaged item I have purchased with missing screws. I won’t be purchasing any more. I have a 25 minute drive one way to return it. So I might as well just buy the screws while I am there. Don’t buy repackaged items! It will cost you more, in gas, in your time and more cash to buy the screws that were supposed to be included!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a glass backsplash and did not want to put screw holes in the backsplash. The magnet is super strong. Great space saver. I was using a knife block to hold my knives. This has freed up counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife holder. Everything about this holder met my expectations. I wanted to free up some counter space but I also wanted it to look good & it needed to be strong! We got it the next day after ordering. Used gorilla double sided tape to put it up. And it is perfect. I was worried that it was not going to hold on the splash board or that it wouldn’t hold all my knives as you can see from the picture I didn’t have to worryP
customer_reviews.author: Faith S.

customer_reviews.title: No drilling required
customer_reviews.text: This magnet bar holds our most-used knives securely. Since we didn’t want to drill through our subway tile backsplash, we took a chance and followed some other reviewers’ advice. We used the Command Strips meant for hanging picture frames up to 16 lbs. We mounted the strips along the entire length of the back of the bar. It has held up to daily use with no signs of loosening after a month, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for easy access and safe storage of good knives
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to use a strong magnetic bar for knife access since drawers and blocks seem cumbersome or take up shelf space. This bar held all my heavy knives. I first tried 2 types of heavy duty mounting tape, but after a couple weeks it would come down It was best to mind the instructions for mounting correctly to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ditrying

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife block
customer_reviews.text: I've been using magnetic knife holders for years and this is the nicest one yet. Super solid with a very strong magnet pull. We mounted ours with 4x large command framing strips (velcro) and it's solid. I appreciate that it's plenty long enough to hold all my knives. Very pleased and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Buy it-You Won’t be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of large knives hanging on this strip and have never had an issue with them staying put I used double sided gorilla tape for mounting to granite backsplash and it’s working very well. So we’ll that I bought another one to replace one that I couldn’t get to stick or to solidly hold the knives in place. Love this knife strip!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Ventrella

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic bar is SOOOO much better than the wood block it replaced! First of all, it holds more knives, as well as our kitchen scissors. Also, it LOOKS good...simple, classy. Thirdly, it is strong and reliable. We had a handyman install it so cannot comment on this except that he seemed fine with doing it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harpur

customer_reviews.title: 17" knife holder
customer_reviews.text: One reason for choosing this product was its length; as a chef, I have a number of knives I use regularly and need close at hand. My backup drawer has gotten a little nuts, and buying two of these magnetic holders and mounting them end-to-end was a perfect solution for me. There is plenty of depth to be able to get fingers behind handles, the magnets are more than strong enough to hold large chef's knives, and mounting was very easy with a torpedo level and cordless drill. It's attractive, stable, easy to mount, and easy to use. Not sure what else you would need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Free-up your counter space!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen, with little counter space. In the corner of my countertop, I had a good-sized knife block that I was constantly moving out of the way- but needed all of the knives in the block. This magnetic knife holder solved that problem and I like the way it looks, too! The magnet is strong, but not too strong where you’d have to yank on the handle to free the knife. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic knife bar is really great. I was able to take it out of the box and use it immediately. I have had it for over 3 months now and use it daily without any problems. I bought the double sided one so I wouldn't have to hassle with using tools to hang it up. The company has sent follow-up emails insuring that they are there should I have any issues with it. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, convenient to use, and looks *sharp*.  Get it?  *Sharp*  ;p
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnetic knife holder for my wife and she loves it. Actually, as I do the dishes, I think I probably love it more than her. Super convenient to store our knives on. It came with a template to get the anchor bolt holes in the perfect spots and was easy to do. Their customer support has been OUTSTANDING! I have had zero issues and therefore no reason to be in contact with them but I have still received multiple emails from them making sure that we are completely satisfied. I would absolutely recommend the product AND the company to anyone. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great item! But don't plan to use double-sided tape to hold it.
customer_reviews.text: The knife holder is great! It's a heavy, solid holder--your knives won't be going anywhere--and it's very attractive. I used Gorilla Glue double-sided tape to hold it and that was not able to keep it up on the wall--I tried it 5 times (I thought maybe the humidity in the summer was causing it to fail--nope!). The tape stated it would hold up to 30 lbs--and the knife holder with knives is less than that. But that is not a fault of the knife holder--that's the tape. Now that I know for sure that I like it in the spot I had it, I am more willing to take the permanent measure of drilling into my tile.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here.
customer_reviews.text: I actually hung my 17" knife holder with 4 command hook velcro hangers because I didn't want to drill holes in my stone backsplash and they are working just fine. The magnet is strong and is currently holding 8 different knives and a cleaver. It even matches my stainless steel appliances. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to be rid of the knife box. Now I know what was in it without having to memorize. I've been plagued with this knife box for 1 year and only knew about 3 knives. Had to look to see what the others were and therefore never used. Looks great where I put my metal knife rack.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Knife Storage
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty magnet knife holder, easy installation and holds knives securely. Really convenient for cooks that want to see the knife they want to use at a glance instead of digging through a drawer or hoping you pull out the correct knife you need from a knife block. I've had similar magnet holders in the past, I love having my knives visible, secure and at arms length for quick use. If your a cook this is a must have for your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Sshelton

customer_reviews.title: It's strong!
customer_reviews.text: I became obsessed with this magnet when I saw one on the wall of my daughters new home. Someone had left it behind, and I was hooked, I HAD to have one! How on earth did I live so long without one? I have it attached to the side of my refrigerator, it is strong and holds all my beloved knives. It has free'd up much needed counter space. Now the area is so clean and uncluttered. I had two large knife blocks on the counter, and they took up so much space. I absolutely love this item and I tell anyone who will listen, that this is a must have item!!
customer_reviews.author: Ksfrmgrl

customer_reviews.title: Quality, looks great, holds many heavy knives!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3. We hung in a straight line under entire cabinet. Wish it was cheaper but hey, we did use the 20% off coupon on two that we bought. Installation seemed a little tricky but got the hang of it. Can hold many heavy knives. That's why I spent more on this strip. Holds them straight up and down. Love the stainless look opposed to those black ones out there too. Overall very good quality product. Again, after buying and installing one we bought two more!!!
customer_reviews.author: eve jones

customer_reviews.title: Secure way to store knives!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t we ditch the wooden block for this magnetic strip earlier?? This is so easy to use and clears up counter space! Easy to install and very sturdy. The knives are heavy but this strip hold them very securely!
customer_reviews.author: Redjess81

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this knife rack really rocks! It has powerful magnets that attach to the fridge securely and my knives line up perfectly. Clean and slick with ample room for at least eight knives. Perfect! I would highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I always like the idea of a knife holder, but did not want to drill holes in my wall. When I saw this, I bought it, it looks great on the refrigerator, it also frees up space from my counter (got rid of the knife block). The magnetic bar is very secure (screwing it in the wall is an option)
customer_reviews.author: ChalHeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect magnetic strip
customer_reviews.text: I e always wanted one of these, and I’m glad that I finally bought it. The installation was incredible easy with the stencil provided and the magnetic strip was setup in minutes. The strength of the magnetic is great, there’s no chance of the knives falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is about 16 inches long, the magnet is strong (read the directions for placement!), and it large enough to hold 8 of my cooking knives with adequate space between them to select the one you need.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

product_meta.title: Premium 17 Inch Stainless Steel Magnetic Knife Holder – Professional Magnetic Knife Strip - Space-Saving Knife Rack/Knife Bar With Powerful Magnetic Pull Force (Upgraded Version)
feature_bullets: EXTRA STRENGTH MAGNETS – We bring you a *NEW, UPGRADED* 17" stainless steel knife bar, now including *HEAVY-DUTY MAGNETS* which will never lose their magnetic force. This update provides you with a high quality magnetic knife holder that holds your entire knife set securely and in easy reach. Our chosen magnet has an even magnetic force across the bar allowing you to safely use the entire 17” length. The magnetic grip is very powerful, yet it only takes a gentle tug to release any knife for use!

SECURE ANY TYPE OF KNIVES - This magnetic knife strip is designed specifically to hold *ANY SET OF KNIVES* firmly, without slipping or shifting - not even a hint of a wobble! Our magnetic bar is calibrated to securely hold knives of many weights with ease. We are happy to provide worry free, safe storage for Chef's knives, Butcher knives, Cleavers, Bread knives, Carving knives and ANY other Kitchen knife you may have - from the largest, heaviest of your knives to the smallest and skinniest ones.

SIMPLE & ELEGANT MODERN DESIGN – Our HMmagnets 17’’ magnetic knife holder is made from high quality stainless steel and designed with a sleek, elegant appearance. The flat, space-saving magnetic bar has a modern design that fits into *ANY KITCHEN STYLE*. The bar is designed to “float” on your wall, hiding the magnets & mounting screws. The design of our bar and the *SIMPLE, CLEAN INSTALATION* allows your knife and stainless steel appliance storage to become a part of your kitchen décor!

HIGHER QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL - Our stainless steel is of type 304, while most brands use type 201. The major difference is the corrosion resistance – type 304 has a higher corrosion resistance which means that under normal environmental conditions, it has a lifetime durability (making it also more expensive). In comparison, type 201’s appearance can be affected within two to three years. In addition, it is longer than the typical 16" magnetic knife holder!

CLEAN YOUR KITCHEN COUNTER & DRAWERS! – HMmagnets magnetic knife strip helps you get rid of your old bulky knife block which takes up precious counter space. Our magnetic knife strip also helps you *KEEP YOUR KNIVES OFF THE COUNTER* and prevents the trouble of an overflowing drawer. All your knives will be visible and within reach - easily grab the proper knife and get to cooking! NOTE: The bar does not have back-sided magnetic pull force so it is not meant to be magnetized to a fridge.
